Value.description:
Code Snippets allows you to create and save small pieces of code (snippets) for later use.
Documentation is available at the Code::Blocks Wiki at http://wiki.codeblocks.org/index.php?title=Code_Snippets_plugin.

Value.author: Original author: Arto Jonsson Maintenance author:Pecan
